pages.text: $(li)The Goblin King is a creature of short stature and with a big head that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_keep)Ruined Keep$(/l).$(br)$(li)Like all Goblins it is a cowardly creature, but he was able to manipulate the most powerful Goblin, the $(l:patchouli:bosses/ogre)Ogre$(/l), to serve him and control the rest of the Goblins by force, keeping them enslaved in this place.

$(li)You will notice that he always tries to keep his distance from you.$(br)$(li)Then he will attack you with his magic staff to deal damage and inflict the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/slowness)Slowness$(/l) II effect to you, reducing your movement speed dramatically for a few seconds.$(br)$(li)This King will drop his $(l:patchouli:armors/goblin_crown)Crown$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:weapons/magic_staff)Magic Staff$(/l) upon death.
